class.name: IntArray
class.description: Integer Array. Array of integers. Can only contain integers. Optimized for memory usage, can't fragment the memory.

method.name: append
method.description: Append an element at the end of the array (alias of [method push_back]).

method.name: append_array
method.description: Append an [IntArray] at the end of this array.

method.name: insert
method.description: Insert a new int at a given position in the array. The position must be valid, or at the end of the array (pos==size()).

method.name: invert
method.description: Reverse the order of the elements in the array (so first element will now be the last).

method.name: push_back
method.description: Append a value to the array.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove an element from the array by index.

method.name: resize
method.description: Set the size of the [IntArray]. If larger than the current size it will reserve some space beforehand, and if it is smaller it will cut off the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Change the int at the given index.
